Trustee_18.name: Isabella Costa
Trustee_18.content: Isabella Costa, as a trustee, attempted to establish a partnership with Liam OConnor but faced rejection due to a lack of established trust from the investor. This failure to secure the investment marks her initial reputation as neutral, reflecting an attempt to create a fair allocation plan despite the outcome.

Investor_0.name: Liam OConnor
Investor_0.content: Liam OConnor has not established any connections and rejected the allocation plan proposed by Isabella Costa due to a lack of trust. This incident contributes to a negative perception of his decision-making as an investor, reflecting potential caution or reluctance to engage.
